thread.title: Easybook Launches Sipitang Express Bus Tickets with Destinations within Brunei and East Malaysia
thread.title_full: Easybook Launches Sipitang Express Bus Tickets with Destinations within Brunei and East Malaysia

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook Launches Sipitang Express Bus Tickets with Destinations within Brunei and East Malaysia
text:
Easybook.com , a well-known booking platform established by enterprising students, proudly offered their newest addition to their services - the Sipitang Express Bus Tickets. As a new partner of the company, the Sipitang Express means to provide bus services within destination points to and from Brunei and Easy Malaysia. The Sipitang Express Bust Tickets were launched by Easybook on the 24th of August, 2015.
The Sipitang Express is specializing in offering cross border express bus services. The bus company is servicing areas like Kota Kinabalu, Lawas and Limbang. All the buses used by the company for service are equipped with reclined seat, enough leg space and air conditioner. The Sipitang Express bus services are known for its safe and comfortable journey and affordable transportation. Consequently, Easybook is happy to announce that Sipitang Express bus tickets are now available for booking at their official site.
As the newest partner of the company, the Sipitang Express will offer express bus services from Kota Kinabalu, more specifically at Terminal Inanam to travel to and from Limbang, Lawas, Brunei and more places. The addition of the company as a partner to Easybook further widens the range of arrival and departure dates, times as well as the locations available for booking at the site.
All bus company partners of the Easybook are offering clean, comfortable and reliable bus services made to ensure that passengers will enjoy the entire ride. But, aside from offering reliable, clean and comfortable bus service, the bust tickets offered by Sipitang Express at Easybook are also available at reasonable prices. Customers who wish to enjoy such journey are always free to book Sipitang Express Bus tickets at Easybook.
Easybook is an online booking platform for means of transportation, and the company is headquartered in Singapore. To serve as a convenient booking place for bus tickets is just one of the purposes for which the site was established. Currently, the company has already partnered with more than 150 bus companies that offer over 10k departures every day on more than 6k routes. Some of these bus companies are Sri Maju, Lapan Lapan and Luxury Coach with Sipitang Express as the newest addition.
To know more information about the offered Sipitang Bus tickets now offered at Easybook, visit http://www.easybook.com/Pages_SGMY/news/sipitang-bus-tickets.aspx .
